snippet.title: Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story Trailer 1995
snippet.description:
Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story Trailer 1995

Official Content From Acclaim

You're Bruce Lee, the ultimate martial arts warrior, and you're in for the fight of your life. In order to survive, you must fight through chain wielding villains to face The Phantom...it's a fight to the finish!
Platforms: Sega Genesis, Super Nintendo

Sega Genesis, Super Nintendo
, Martial Arts,  video game, trailer, spot, preview, clip, play, Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story
